Title: Fix petential cluster link error.
Description:
when we dynamically set 'maxclients' we could reach an inconsistency between maximum file
descriptor number of the process and server.maxclients. And later could cause cluster link and link
fd inconsistency.

Title: Error opening /setting AOF rewrite IPC pipes: No such file or directory
Description: when redis is doing aof rewrite, use 'config set appendonly on' , maybe cause redis crash, all new coming clients will be reset by redis-server.

Description: setting watchdog crashes redis during rdb save point

Title: Software watchdog crashes redis during rdb save point
Description: redis crash after config set watchdog

Description: setting maxclients to a large value makes system crash

Description: increasing maxclients make system crash

Title: redis crash under the add maxclients
Description: redis crashed after 'config set maxclients'

Title: Fix infinite loop: redis-cli should not use hostsock when cluster return redirection
Description: sets config.host and config.port, make infinite loop
Root Cause: Miss to propagate to other variables

Title: config_set_numerical_field() integer overflow

Title: fix active-defrag-threshold value error
Description: The active-defrag-threshold-lower/active-defrag-threshold-upper min/max value in redis.conf should be consistent with 'config set' command.

Description: config set list-max-ziplist-size didn't support negative values

Title: fix rewrite config: auto-aof-rewrite-min-size
Description: using 'config set auto-aof-rewrite-min-size ' and '' can only be number which mean that I can only rewrite auto-aof-rewrite-min-size by bytes, which is not convenient.

Title: client-output-buffer-limit' input strings treated differently between redis.conf and CONFIG SET
Description: There's a semantic difference between configuring client-output-buffer-limit through redis.conf and configuring the limits through the 'CONFIG SET client-output-buffer-limit' command
